refnamediv.refpurpose: Reads numeric values from another allocated function-table and rescales them.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This subroutine reads numeric values from another allocated function-table and rescales them according to the max and min values given by the user.

refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.synopsis: f # time size -24 ftable min max

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: #, time, size -- the usual GEN parameters. See f statement.
ftable -- ftable must be an already allocated table with the same size as this function.

note.title: Note
note.para: This GEN is useful, for example, to eliminate the starting offset in exponential segments allowing a real starting from zero.
